findings.title: Unprotected contract owner authority
findings.description: The contract owner can claim all the balance of the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected contract owner authority
findings.description: The contract owner can stop addresses from transactions.

findings.title: Code repetition issues
findings.description: The contract contains repetitive code segments, which may lead to gas efficiency, complexity, readability, security, and maintainability issues.

findings.title: Non-compliance with solidity naming conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide, affecting readability and maintainability.

findings.title: Lack of validation for variable setters
findings.description: The contract does not properly check for zero values in user-supplied input, which may lead to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: Conflicting pragma directives
findings.description: The contract includes multiple conflicting pragma directives, which may produce unexpected errors.

findings.title: Non-stable compiler version
findings.description: The contract does not lock the pragma to a specific version, which may lead to compatibility issues.
